choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Here is a draft of your message, please let me know if you would like any changes made. 

Hi Boss! It’s been great working with you over these past few years and I really appreciate all that you have done for this team to help us achieve our goals. However, due to personal reasons it has become necessary for me to move on from the company at this time. Please let my colleagues know how much they are appreciated as well! All the best in your future endeavors
